features_Skills.points: Comprehensive Motivation Content: Provides a variety of motivational quotes, stories, and tips to inspire and encourage users.
User-Friendly Interface: Designed to be easy to navigate and visually appealing, ensuring a smooth user experience.
Speaker Functionality: Includes a speaker feature that allows users to listen to motivational content instead of reading it, enhancing accessibility and user convenience.
Responsive Design: Ensures the website is accessible and looks great on all devices, from desktops to mobile phones.
Tech stack : HTML5, Css3/Scss, Canvas, and JavaScript(ES6)
Geolocation-Based Weather Data: Automatically fetches weather details based on the user's current location
Search Functionality: Users can search for a city by typing its name, with suggestion options.
Current Weather Details: Displays temperature, humidity, and a weather icon.
Hourly Forecast: Provides hourly weather data for the selected location.
Seven-Day Forecast: Shows weather information for the upcoming week.
Location Suggestions: Suggests city names as the user types, using Nominatim's geocoding service.
Debounced Search: Reduces the number of requests by waiting for a short period after the user stops typing.
Tech stack :React, HTML5, Css3/Scss, JavaScript (ES6), Open-Meteo API,Nominatim API (OpenStreetMap),Axios
Displays detailed information about the nine planets in an interactive format.
Dynamic animations are powered by GSAP, enhancing user engagement and making planet transitions smooth.
Visuals and animations are rendered on the HTML5 Canvas, offering a rich graphical experience.
Utilizes JavaScript for interactivity, enabling users to explore planet data efficiently.
Tech stack : HTML5, Css3/Scss, JavaScript (ES6), HTML5 Canvas and GSAP
User Management: Add, edit, delete, and list users dynamically.
Dynamic IDs: Each new user gets a unique ID, ensuring there are no duplicate IDs.
Responsive Design: Fully responsive design that adapts to different screen sizes.
Axios for API Requests: All CRUD operations are done using Axios to interact with a remote API.
Tech stack : React, Axios, Vite, Css
Add, delete, and update tasks with ease.
Search for tasks by their title using a dynamic search bar.
Mark tasks as completed or pending with a simple toggle.
Tasks are saved in `localStorage`, ensuring they remain available even after a page refresh.
Tasks are sorted by priority to ensure users can focus on the most important ones first.
Fully optimized for both desktop and mobile devices.
Tech stack : React, Html5, Scss/Css3
Crafted a dynamic multi-calculator website with arithmetic, BMI, sample interest, and CGPA calculators.
Ensured seamless user experience with intuitive interfaces and efficient calculations.
Delivered a versatile tool catering to diverse mathematical needs.
Tech stack:  HTML5, Css3/Scss, and JavaScript.
Planet Information: Retrieves and displays detailed information about all planets discovered till now.
RESTful API Integration: Uses a RESTful API to dynamically fetch and update planet details.
Comprehensive Data: Provides information about each planet, including various attributes and characteristics.
Responsive Design: Ensures the application is accessible and looks great on all devices.
Tech stacks: Html5, Css3, Javascript(es6).
Fully Responsive: The application is optimized for all devices, from desktops to mobile phones.
User-Friendly Interface: Intuitive design with clear controls for starting, stopping, and resetting the stopwatch.
Start/Stop Functionality: Easily start and stop the timer with a single click.
Reset Option: Users can reset the stopwatch to start a new session.
Tech stacks: ReactJS, Css/Scss
Delight in our visually appealing website offering effortless browsing of our diverse menu and easy reservation-making.
Embark on a culinary journey enhanced by technology, experiencing the fusion of flavours and web innovation
Tech stack : HTML5, Css3/Scss, Canvas, and JavaScript(ES6)
